title: Michelin - worldwide number of employees by region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
The difference of Number of employees between the highest and lowest Region is 68751.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The Number of employees is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
The difference of Number of employees between the highest and lowest Region is 68751.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
The second highest Number of employees is appeared to be the Region North America.
The difference of Number of employees between the highest and lowest Region is 68751.0.
Number of employees at Region Europe is 70599.0 , second place is North America at 21541.0, and thirdly is Asia (excl. India) at 15259.0.
The Region Africa India Middle-East has 3.01 times less Number of employees than average.
The Number of employees is 117413.0 if we add up values of all Regions.
